thread.section_title: Scribbr Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Scribbr | www.scribbr.com
thread.title: Michael Frelas

author: Michael Frelas
title: Michael Frelas
text: I was skeptical at first but it turned out very well. Work was of excellent quality and required very reasonable monetary investment. The company was in constant contact and the sample work of the editor was provided after checking 10-20 pages of my PhD thesis (so I knew what to expect and had a chance to comment on the work). Great outcome, thank you Patrick very much!
